description:
With enka singer Natsuko`s financial backing, the men and women whose lives were ruined by the Gokudols cast their own idol unit to take them head-on.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Dokkiri / Yuuki o Ageru / Shall We Dance or Revenge? / Mensetsu / Kahanshin no Dekigoto / Hige to Boin
ドッキリ / 勇気をあげる / Shall we dance or revenge? / 面接 / 下半身の出来事 / ヒゲとボイン
